data.actual_result: Usernames don't scale with the change of your Chat Font Scaling
data.expected_result: Usernames should scale with the change of your Chat Font Scaling
data.short_description: Member List names don't scale with Chat Font Scaling
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into your User Settings -> Appearance and change your Chat Font Scaling to 150 (so it is easily noticeable) - Close your User Settings and go to a server and observe the names of users on the Member List
